text: Club Esportiu Principat was an Andorran football club from the city of Andorra la Vella. The club was founded in 1989. He won three times the Andorran Premier League and five times the Andorran Cup. The club was dissolved in 2015. == History == The club was founded in 1989 by Penya Madridista Restaurant Charlie's (Real Madrid Supporters' Club of Charlie's Restaurant) as Club Esportiu Principat.The Independent, https://www.independent.co.uk/sport/charlies-restaurant-on-menu-for- scots-1249966.html The club had three consecutives league victories between 1997 and 1999 and five consecutives cup trophies between 1995 and 1999. The club was founding member of the Andorran Premier League in 1995. In 1997 the club was the first Andorran club in an European competition playing versus Dundee United from Scotland. The Andorran team pülayed three times in the (UEFA Cup) but lost in the first round each time. The senior club was registered in Segona Divisió 2015 but withdrew from the competition in the first round. Lower and youth teams continued to compete in their competitions. In 2015 the club was dissolved. == Colours and badge == The team's traditional color was purple. In the beginnings till the mid-2000s the first kit was white due to the origins of the club linked with Real Madrid supporters in Andorra. == Honours == *Primera Divisió: **Winners (3): 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99 **Runners-up (1): 1995–96 *Copa Constitució: **Winners (5): 1994–95, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99 == References == == Other websites == *Principat at UEFA.COM *Principat at Weltfussball.de *Principat at Football-Lineups.com Category:Andorran football clubs Category:1989 establishments in Europe Category:2015 disestablishments in Europe
title: CE Principat
